scripts.build-graph: bun src/server/create-graph.ts && bun build src/client/index.ts --outdir docs --minify
scripts.build-warnings: bun src/server/process-warnings.ts && bun build src/client/warnings.ts --outdir docs --minify
scripts.build-warnings-fast: bun src/server/process-warnings.ts --no-external-link-check && bun build src/client/warnings.ts --outdir docs --minify
scripts.build: bun run build-graph && bun run build-warnings
